Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'finding a hotel' and 'reserving a room at a hotel' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Tyler Jones
- Today is Wednesday the 25th, 12 pm

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Search for a hotel (e.g. in the Center of town`)
- Book a room at a hotel (e.g. Hilton Hotel or whatever the assistant can find for you; e.g. from 10th to 31st)
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Detroit or Pittsburgh)
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Assume:

- Today is Wednesday the 25th, 12 pm
